name: Password Manager
description: This project allows users to store their website name and password in encrypted form, and they can view the decrypted password when needed.

name: URL Shortener App
description: A URL shortener app that transforms long URLs into shorter, more manageable, making them easier to share on social media or other digital channels.

name: Vacation MailBot
description: A vacation mail bot that helps you automate email responses while you're on vacation, allowing you to enjoy your time off without worrying about your inbox.

name: Backend REST-API
description: A backend REST API for a web application that enables communication between the client-side and server-side, allowing for efficient data transfer.
